courses.title: Introduction to Computer Science
courses.description: An introduction to computer science with a focus on programming concepts and problem solving.

courses.title: Data Structures and Algorithms
courses.description: An in-depth look at data structures and algorithms, including analysis and implementation.

courses.title: Web Development
courses.description: A comprehensive guide to building web applications using modern web development tools and frameworks.

courses.title: Artificial Intelligence
courses.description: An overview of artificial intelligence and machine learning, with an emphasis on real-world applications.

courses.title: Mobile App Development
courses.description: A hands-on guide to building mobile applications for iOS and Android using modern mobile development tools.

courses.title: Database Systems
courses.description: A comprehensive look at database systems, including design, implementation, and query optimization.

courses.title: Computer Networks
courses.description: An overview of computer networks and the protocols that govern communication between devices.

courses.title: Software Engineering
courses.description: An introduction to the principles of software engineering, including requirements analysis, design, and testing.

courses.title: Operating Systems
courses.description: A comprehensive look at operating systems, including process management, memory management, and file systems.

courses.title: Computer Security
courses.description: An overview of computer security and the techniques used to protect computer systems and networks.
